reviews.title: Good location for a short vacation at the Black Sea Coast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Lovely friendly hotel

reviews.text: -- along the boulevard Primorski Polk (no 468) which links downtown Varna to Black Sea resorts St. Konstantin & Elena and Golden Sands and close to Varna city centre (better prices for food, shopping and drinks during season in Varna); POI for taxi/GPS – Varna Piccadilly Mall and Shell Gas Stations across the hotel;
reviews.title: Excellent hotel for the price charged
